docs.title: Home
docs.text: This is documentation page for the pinaka API.

docs.title: bhagavad gita
docs.text:
Shlokas of the Bhagavad Gita are stored as GitaShloka objects.

structure of a GitaShloka object

json { "adhyaya": 0, "shloka": 0, "speaker": "the speaker of the shloka", "original": "the actual shloka", "romanised": "romanised version of the shloka", "hindi": "hindi translation of the shloka", "english": "english translation of the shloka" }

docs.title: fetching a shloka
docs.text:
• Endpoint: /api/bhagavadgita/{adhyaya}/{shloka}

Fetches the shloka number from the provided adhyaya number, the shloka and adhyaya number must be positive integer values. If no data for the requested values are found a 404 status is returned.

docs.title: querying the gita
docs.text:
• Endpoint: /api/bhagavadgita/{adhyaya}

fetches multiple shlokas from the API and returns them as a list of Shlokas.

docs.title: PARAMETERS
docs.text: Param Info Dtype range Range of shlokas to be fetched [int, int] shlokas The shloka number of the shlokas to fetch [int, ...]

docs.title: shiv tandava
docs.text:
Shlokas from the Shiva Tandava Strotam are stored as TandavaShloka objects.

structure of a TandavaShloka object

json { "shloka": 1, "original": "जटाटवीगलज्जलप्रवाहपावितस्थले गलेऽवलम्ब्य लम्बितां भुजङ्गतुङ्गमालिकाम् । डमड्डमड्डमड्डमन्निनादवड्डमर्वयं चकार चण्डताण्डवं तनोतु नः शिवः शिवम् ॥१॥", "romanised": "Jatatavigalajjala pravahapavitasthale Galeavalambya lambitam bhujangatungamalikam Damad damad damaddama ninadavadamarvayam Chakara chandtandavam tanotu nah shivah shivam" }

docs.title: fetching a shloka
docs.text:
• Endpoint: /shivtandava/{shloka}

Queries a particular shloka from the strotam using it's index number. a 404 error is returned if the index is invalid (>17). For querying shlokas in group see the next endpoint.

docs.title: fetching the entire strotam
docs.text:
• Endpoint: /shivtandava

Entire shloka in form of a list of TandavaShloka objects is returned.
